title: Walkable to Parks, Dining & Entertainment, Elevators, Pet-Friendly
posting_body: Questions about life at 700 Broadway apartments?
Want to see the place for yourself?
Give us a call or send us an email to connect with our friendly property team.
At 700 Broadway, the health and safety of our apartment community come first.
That’s why we offer virtual tours, so you can see our studio, one, and two bedroom apartments from wherever you are, and online applications to make things as easy as possible for you.
Reach out today to get started!
Wake up at the center of the action every day when you call 700 Broadway home.
Covet your premium location in Capitol Hill near Volunteer Park, minutes from downtown by foot or light rail.
Step into a lifestyle with the perfect texture, and enjoy easy access to the very best Seattle has to offer.

Crash hard from all the excitement in a cozy and pet-friendly space with creature comforts like hardwood flooring and stainless-steel appliances, plus timesaving conveniences like your dishwasher and in-home washer and dryer.
Courtyard with BBQ Grills and Picnic Area
For more information, visit us at: <URL>
